patthana21.11:1.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana21.11:2.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.11:3.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
